artist: Engraver: Philippe Jacques de Loutherbourg II
description: alpine landscape with footbridge crossing waterfall; chapel at center of bridge; two men at foot of bridge talking; one man seated; monk approaching chapel; man on upper section of bridge
inscription:
Signatuer, and  Inscription
on sheet in black: 55 / Loutherbourg pinx / Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain
portfolio: From from "Cabinet Poullain; Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'apres les tableaux & dessing qui composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain", plate 55
title: Print
